data.name: Cardseer Demo
data.detailed_description:
Fast paced card combat meets strategic deck building and intriguing item choices in the world of Cardseer. Approachable for newcomers with depth for veterans, choose one of 4 distinct classes with powerful and unique abilities, cards and artifacts, then take on the host of dangerous enemies standing in your way. Build your deck along the way and adapt to each challenge thrown your way.




Cardseer features a campaign with an intriguing and interactive story. Uncover a dark plot to sow to discord between the peoples of Aventia as you choose your path across the continent. The choices you make and the characters you meet along the way will change the course of history. Those seeking a challenge will want to venture into the Gauntlet, where you fight your way through randomized regions to claim ultimate glory.




  • The first story of the campaign, the Vanguard
  • Gauntlet mode with two regions. Can you fight your way to the end?
  • 4 distinct classes with unique hero powers and artifacts
  • Over 200 powerful and varied cards to master
  • 40+ artifacts with playstyle altering effects




  • A 5th class
  • Campaign stories for all classes
  • At least 5 regions to explore in both Campaign and Gauntlet
  • More cards, artifacts, enemies
  • Endless dungeon crawl, daily challenges, unlockable cosmetics and more

data.short_description: Card combat with a Roguelike twist! Choose 1 of 4 unique classes, construct your deck, equip game-changing artifacts and battle fearsome foes in Cardseer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics with at least 1 GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
